Javascript is disabled. View full album

This one trip took over a year in-game, maybe 20 minutes real time. Netted me almost 600 science points. Now, with my remaining 300, should I get Large Electrics or Unmanned Tech? Hmmm....

Edited December 30, 2013 by Roastduck
album wasn't working
With unmanned tech you can do one-way missions to Eve.
Yeah, that's what I went with. I'm about to put the same model probe on a bigger lifter and send it to Jool, and send another one to Eve while the Jool one is en route.

Congratulations on your first Duna mission. I got almost the same orbit the first time I went... backwards and near polar. Instead of burning fuel to change my inclination, I just went to Ike and came back
